response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,500,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This is an extraordinary offer, tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value while also maximizing my earnings from the sale. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 1400000}
